before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"87iqc","text":"Install Python. We recommend using conda, miniconda, or mamba for this.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":42,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3nk4j","text":"A Protocol describing the application of LIANA+ on a spatially-resolved metabolite-transcriptome dataset from a recent murine Parkinson’s disease model Vicari et al., 2023. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":152,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"16j6p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ft2lq","text":"We demonstrate LIANA+’s utility in harmonizing spatially-resolved transcriptomics and MALDI-MSI data to unravel metabolite-mediated interactions and the molecular mechanisms of dopamine regulation in the \nstriatum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cci8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50heo","text":"Two particular challenges with this data are: - The unaligned spatial locations of the two omics technologies and the untargeted nature of the MALDI-MSI data, which results in a large number of features with unknown\n identities. Only few of which were previously identified as specific metabolites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6394","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac33l","text":"Here, we show untargeted modelling of known and unknown metabolite peaks and their spatial relationships with transcriptomics data. Specifically, we use a multi-view modelling strategy MISTy to decipher global spatial relationships of metabolite peaks with cell types and brain-specific receptors. Then, we use LIANA+’s local metrics to pinpoint the subregions of interaction. We also show strategies to enable spatial multi-omics analysis from diverse omics technologies with unaligned locations and observations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":185,"length":5},{"key":2,"offset":320,"length":13}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p7gd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46be3","text":" This protocol is associated with our Nature Cell Biology paper describing LIANA+.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5AC1F1202C9111EF83D90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41587-023-01937-y"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5AC1F1202C9111EF83D90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://liana-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/notebooks/misty.html"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5AC1F1202C9111EF83D90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://liana-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/notebooks/bivariate.html"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"d4kk7","text":"Hardware:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16fi1","text":"A desktop or laptop computer with at least 8GB RAM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52q6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f05em","text":"Software:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1g322","text":"Python version 3.8 or newer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mafq","text":"liana-py (installable via pip or github) version 1.2.0 or newer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dt5e","text":"numpy version \u003c 2.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epjon","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cv0r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"eabgm","text":"Vicari, M. et al. Spatial multimodal analysis of transcriptomes and metabolomes in tissues. Nat. Biotechnol. (2023) doi:10.1038/s41587-023-01937-y.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fakf8","text":"# In command line / or jupyter notebook","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"154ec","text":"pip install liana[common]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1msog","text":"pip install adjustText==0.8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kb09","text":"import numpy as np","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fibkj","text":"import liana as li","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28e5p","text":"import mudata as mu","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vc16","text":"import scanpy as sc","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iccj","text":"from matplotlib import pyplot as plt","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oatl","text":"from adjustText import adjust_text","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"216ti","text":"# save figure parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cto6q","text":"kwargs = {'frameon':False, 'size':1.5, 'img_key':'lowres'}","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3v3ou","text":"# let's download the data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bpot","text":"rna = sc.read(\"sma_rna.h5ad\", backup_url=\"https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/44624974?private_link=4744950f8768d5c8f68c\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g143","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"554op","text":"msi = sc.read(\"sma_msi.h5ad\", backup_url=\"https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/44624971?private_link=4744950f8768d5c8f68c\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebv9t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdhr9","text":"ct = sc.read(\"sma_ct.h5ad\", backup_url=\"https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/44624968?private_link=4744950f8768d5c8f68c\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74biv","text":"# and create a MuData object","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dmpv","text":"mdata = mu.MuData({'rna':rna, 'msi':msi, 'ct':ct})","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89kfc","text":"# examine the object","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a3ta","text":"mdata","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72ast","text":"# examine data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q45q","text":"fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 3, figsize=(12, 3))

sc.pl.spatial(rna, color='log1p_total_counts', ax=axes[0], **kwargs, show=False)
sc.pl.spatial(msi, color='Dopamine', cmap='magma', ax=axes[1], **kwargs, show=False)
sc.pl.spatial(ct, color='MSN1', cmap='viridis', ax=axes[2], **kwargs, show=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(wspace=0, hspace=0)
fig.tight_layout()","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hqs2","text":"# examine experimental design","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"883gg","text":"sc.pl.spatial(rna, color=['lesion', 'region'], **kwargs, wspace=0.25)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adp2h","text":"sc.pp.highly_variable_genes(rna, flavor='cell_ranger', n_top_genes=5000)
sc.pp.highly_variable_genes(msi, flavor='cell_ranger', n_top_genes=150)
ct.var['cv'] = ct.X.A.var(axis=0) / ct.X.A.mean(axis=0)
ct.var['highly_variable'] = ct.var['cv'] > np.percentile(ct.var['cv'], 20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csomf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a0e","text":"msi = msi[:, msi.var['highly_variable']]
rna = rna[:, rna.var['highly_variable']]
ct = ct[:, ct.var['highly_variable']]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28of9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaknq","text":"# scale msi intensities","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du5o4","text":"sc.pp.scale(msi, max_value=5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sgfj","text":"metalinks = li.rs.translate_column(resource=metalinks,
                                   map_df=map_df,
                                   column='gene_symbol',
                                   one_to_many=1)
metalinks.head()","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Compute Spatial Proximies for the Multi-view Model
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8rpc7","text":"# We use the metabolite modality as a reference to which we align the other modalities.\n# We use the `spatial_neighbors` function to compute the spatial proximity from cell types and brain-specific receptors to the metabolite intensities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11h6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9se8o","text":"plot, _ = li.ut.query_bandwidth(coordinates=rna.obsm['spatial'], start=0, end=1500)\nplot","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uq4c","text":"# Intersect the RNA modality with the receptors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t1q6","text":"receptors = np.intersect1d(metalinks['gene_symbol'].unique(), rna.var_names)\nrec = rna[:, receptors].copy()","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Compute Spatial Proximies for the Multi-view Model
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"9rfh7","text":"# choose bandwidth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58i1g","text":"bandwidth = 500
cutoff = 0.1
# distances of metabolties to RNA
reference = mdata.mod["msi"].obsm["spatial"]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Compute Spatial Proximies for the Multi-view Model
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6iil8","text":"# Compute proximities to the reference for each modality ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftmgd","text":"li.ut.spatial_neighbors(ct, bandwidth=bandwidth, cutoff=cutoff, spatial_key=\"spatial\", reference=reference, set_diag=False, standardize=False)\nli.ut.spatial_neighbors(rec, bandwidth=bandwidth, cutoff=cutoff, spatial_key=\"spatial\", reference=reference, set_diag=False, standardize=False)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dvgt","text":"# MISTy
mdata.update_obs()
misty = li.mt.MistyData({"intra": msi, "receptor": rec, "ct": ct}, enforce_obs=False, obs=mdata.obs)
misty","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5ml0","text":"# Learn the relationships between intra and the extra views","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p1m0","text":"misty(model=li.mt.sp.LinearModel, verbose=True, bypass_intra=True, maskby='lesion')","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2lihn","text":"li.pl.target_metrics(misty, stat='multi_R2', return_fig=True, top_n=20, filter_fun=lambda x: x['intra_group']=='intact')","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lh8v","text":"interactions = misty.uns['interactions']","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkp3a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ge9a","text":"interactions = interactions[(interactions['intra_group'] == 'intact') & (interactions['target'] == 'Dopamine')]
# Create scatter plot
plt.figure(figsize=(5, 4))
# rank rank by abs importances
interactions['rank'] = interactions['importances'].rank(ascending=False)
plt.scatter(interactions['rank'], interactions['importances'], s=11,
            c=interactions['view'].map({'ct': '#008B8B', 'receptor': '#a11838'}))
            
# add for top 10
top_n = interactions[interactions['rank'] <= 10]
texts = []
for i, row in top_n.iterrows():
    texts.append(plt.text(row['rank'], row['importances'], row['predictor'], fontsize=10))
adjust_text(texts, arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle="->", color='grey', lw=1.5))
plt.tight_layout()","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kk5b","text":"# Focusing on Dopamine, we can next use LIANA+'s local metrics to identify the subregions of interactions with MSN1/2 cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fia30","text":"# to do so, we need to interpolate one modality to the other, such that they are on the same coordinate system, while this is done internally for the multi-view learning, we need to interpolate it as:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au7dc","text":"metabs = li.ut.interpolate_adata(target=msi, reference=rna, use_raw=False, spatial_key='spatial')","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch8m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ef486","text":"# let's rebuild this with the update modalities:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q9nb","text":"mdata = mu.MuData({'msi': metabs, 'rna':rna, 'deconv':ct}, obsm=rna.obsm, obs=rna.obs, uns=rna.uns)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pj22","text":"# re-calculate neighbours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9eic7","text":"li.ut.spatial_neighbors(mdata, bandwidth=bandwidth, cutoff=cutoff, set_diag=True)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvcr1","text":"# define interactions of interest","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ff6","text":"interactions = metalinks[['metabolite', 'gene_symbol']].apply(tuple, axis=1).tolist()","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7n8d","text":"# Let's calculate the local metrics for the Dopamine intensities with and Drd1/2 receptors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77ht0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76tdc","text":"li.mt.bivariate(mdata, 
                local_name='cosine',
                x_mod='msi', 
                y_mod='rna',
                key_added='lr',
                x_use_raw=False, 
                y_use_raw=False,
                verbose=True, 
                mask_negatives=True, 
                n_perms=1000,
                interactions=interactions,
                x_transform=sc.pp.scale,
                y_transform=sc.pp.scale,
            )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Plot Bivariate Similarity between Dopamine and Drd1/2 receptors
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"5lpcs","text":"sc.pl.spatial(mdata.mod['lr'], 
              color=['Dopamine^Drd1', 'Dopamine^Drd2'],
              cmap='cividis_r', vmax=1, layer='pvals',
              **kwargs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: LIANA+_Integrating_MultiOmics_Data
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"brfqt","text":"Please ensure numpy \u003c= 2.0 is installed in any new environment, as some packages might misbehave due to the recent update.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
